Bash(python -c "
import json
with open\(''.claude/skills/tikhub-api-helper/openapi.json'', ''r'', encoding=''utf-8''\) as f:
    data = json.load\(f\)
    
# Get Weibo realtime search API
path = data[''paths''][''/api/v1/weibo/web_v2/fetch_realtime_search''][''get'']
print\(''Weibo realtime search parameters:''\)
for param in path.get\(''parameters'', []\):
    print\(f""  {param[''name'']}: {param.get\(''description'', ''N/A''\)} \(required: {param.get\(''required'', False\)}\)""\)
")

Bash(python -c "import json; data = json.load\(open\(''.claude/skills/tikhub-api-helper/openapi.json'', ''r'', encoding=''utf-8''\)\); path = data[''paths''][''/api/v1/xiaohongshu/web_v2/fetch_search_notes''][''get'']; print\(''Xiaohongshu parameters:''\); [print\(f""  {p[''name'']}: required={p.get\(''required'', False\)}""\) for p in path.get\(''parameters'', []\)]")

Bash(python -c "
import json
with open\(''xpeng_iron_robot_research_raw_data.json'', ''r'', encoding=''utf-8''\) as f:
    data = json.load\(f\)

print\(''Douyin sample data:''\)
for i, post in enumerate\(data[''douyin''][''posts''][:5]\):
    aweme = post.get\(''aweme_info'', {}\)
    print\(f''\\n[{i+1}] {aweme.get\(""desc"", ""N/A""\)[:80]}...''\)
    print\(f''Author: {aweme.get\(""author"", {}\).get\(""nickname"", ""N/A""\)}''\)
    print\(f''Stats: likes={aweme.get\(""statistics"", {}\).get\(""digg_count"", 0\)}, comments={aweme.get\(""statistics"", {}\).get\(""comment_count"", 0\)}''\)
    print\(f''Sentiment: {post.get\(""_sentiment"", ""neutral""\)}''\)
")
